text:
Ichi is painfully aware of how the environment is so familiar to him. He didn’t travel with a lot of money but every so often he would splurge and spend the night in a hotel room.

So the kitschy paintings and cheap desk aren’t new sights to him, nor is the single bed with its new white bedspread. It used to feel like a home away from home, now it just feels wrong. Like he’s one of the objects in the room and not a living, breathing person.

"I see you're warming up to me," he sighs as he runs his hand through Ichi's hair. "In such a short amount of time, too... I wonder how close we'll be by the time we get home?"

Though that could likely be traced back to his exhausting day - being kidnapped and paraded around a club like some kind of prize. If his heart weren’t about to beat out of his chest, Ichi might just be the first of the two men to fall asleep.

He does so himself, in short bursts that leave him jerking awake to see the time displayed on the clock and make sure that Shin is still awake.

For whatever reason the thought of being asleep when his captor wakes up terrifies Ichi.

Shin doesn't consider himself a morning person, but he's more than welcoming of the sunlight filtering in through the curtains and the birds chirping outside. Stretching and yawning, he's slept fairly well. He attributes his good night's sleep with his new sex doll, having clung to him throughout the night like a body pillow.

Shin takes a moment to look over Ichi's sleeping form, smiling to himself before giving his nipples a sharp pinch.

"Good morning, my doll," he whispers, giving him a kiss to the cheek. "Did you sleep well? Today is going to be a busy day..."

They aren’t sore but the sudden and sharp pain is more than enough to wake Ichi and give him a reminder of the previous day’s events. He flinches when the man kisses his bulging cheek, mouth still stuffed with the cum-stained cloth but almost completely dry with how long he’s been gagged for.

"Today is going to be very fun," Shin explains. "First we're going to visit some shrines, where I'll show you off like the pretty doll you are. I'll be sure to throw in a prayer for the gods that you'll stay by my side forever."

He gives the head of Ichi's cock a kiss before continuing, strokes speeding up along the shaft.

"Then we can go back to that strip club at night... the people there are going to enjoy playing with you. I might even have to make you the star of an event. How do you feel about strutting onstage like a pretty little slut?"

The man’s being gentle still, throwing Ichi off kilter for the second time in as many days. It doesn’t line up with everything else Shin has done, but Ichi can’t deny that he prefers being treated like this as opposed to anything worse.

He’d have to become accustomed to the man if he couldn’t escape him - get used to life as Shin’s sex doll and cuddle buddy. Would it be easier on him if he just pretended that this was normal? That Shin hadn’t kidnapped him from the side of the road? Probably not. He was only two days in anyhow, it probably wasn’t good that he was already considering the possibility of life with Shin until the man grew bored of him.

Ichi moans as Shin picks up speed, wiggling the best he can to provide more friction to his cock. Humiliating, yes, but the quicker it was over the quicker Ichi would be able to get past the embarrassment.

He’s so entranced with the movement that he nearly misses Shin’s mention of the strip club. If it was the same one that meant that they were going to be in the area for at least another night before moving on. Ichi has no idea what Shin’s travel plans include but he can’t imagine anything truly pleasant. 

He tries shaking his head and grunts when the movement doesn’t fully come through as he cums in Shin’s hand and over his tape bondage. He could handle the shrines he thinks but the strip club was too much.

Shin smiles as Ichi wriggles and moans behind the cloth gag, taking great pleasure in seeing him struggle to move in his bondage. Once it's all done and he cums into his hand, Shin cleans up the mess with a tissue before throwing it in the trash bin.

He leans up to give him another kiss to the cheek, whispering in his ear.

"Just a faceless little sex doll for my pleasure... I might even make the mask a permanent addition when I put you on display at home."

The quiet that he’s forced into makes Ichi antsy. He has no way of protesting being brought to the club again. Though...as much as he would be loathe to admit it, he’s actually thankful for the idea of having a mask through the ordeal. It’d be uncomfortable but it was almost better to think that he wouldn’t be able to see the men violating him.

Ichi sighs through the gag, closing his eyes when Shin kisses his cheek. He just had to bide his time and go through with the man said until the chance to get away came up.

Laying on the bed, he has no choice but to wait for the man to ready him for the day.
